title: MD
biography: Kiara Advani, , is an Indian actress who works primarily in Hindi films. One of the highest-paid actresses in India, Advani is a recipient of several accolades including an IIFA Award and two Zee Cine Awards, alongside nominations for two Filmfare Awards.
aiSummary: S. H. Advani is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 99 at Hemato-oncology pioneer (Member). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, Nature Medicine, The Lancet. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
